Title: The Male Gaze: The Heat of the Night
Director: Osama Chami, Enrique Gimeno, Eoin Maher, Moshe Rosenthal, Anthony Schatteman, Guido Verelst, Valentina Chamorro Westergårdh
Writer: Osama Chami, Enrique Gimeno, Eoin Maher, Moshe Rosenthal, Anthony Schatteman, Guido Verelst, Valentina Chamorro Westergårdh
Actors: Ezra Fieremans, Andreas La Chenardière, Thomas Ryckewaert, Steven van Watermeulen
Plot: When darkness falls, temperatures rise in these six stories about late night confessions, intimacy for sale, high speed hookups and full moon frissons. But when the sun comes up and reality reveals itself, will it have all been worth it?
